backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with authorization and blob storage mixins, plus comprehensive resident-related types and comparison utilities for sorting.
feature_evidence.json: Reports feature evidence linking print stylesheet updates and print view audits to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend source files describing their roles, UI behaviors, and architectural patterns.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining the global OKLCH color system, theme variables, and consistent light/dark mode styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React application and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application router and authentication flow managing identity, backend actor initialization, profile setup, and route rendering.
frontend/src/components/AddAdlRecordDial: Dialog component for adding ADL records with form inputs, validation, and mutation logic using solid white UI styling.
frontend/src/components/AddDailyVitalsDi: Dialog component that captures and submits daily vital sign data for a resident, converting values and validating required fields before mutation.
frontend/src/components/AddMarRecordDial: Dialog for creating a medication administration record, validating inputs and submitting selected medication details for a resident.
frontend/src/components/AddMedicationDia: Form dialog to add a new medication to a resident, handling dosage, route, physician matching, and administration times.
frontend/src/components/AddResidentDialo: Extensive form dialog for adding a new resident with personal info, physicians, pharmacy, insurance, responsible persons, and medications.
frontend/src/components/AddWeightEntryDi: Dialog to record a resident’s weight entry, converting date and submitting weight data with optional notes.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Component that displays the brand logo with configurable sizing and fallback text rendering on load failure.
frontend/src/components/EditMedicationDi: Dialog component that loads medication details into a form and submits edits using useEditMedication.
frontend/src/components/EditResidentDial: Large form dialog that populates resident data and updates all resident fields via useUpdateResident.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Simple profile setup form that saves a user's name, role, and employee ID via useSaveCallerUserProfile.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Error screen UI showing diagnostic info with retry and logout actions using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider handling Internet Identity login, persistence, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and resident data via a resilient backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor with timeout, optional admin initialization, and React Query state handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dialog overrides, and detailed print-specific layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/actorInit.ts: Implements utilities for promise timeouts, error normalization, and non‑fatal error detection during actor initialization.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Builds normalized asset URLs using Vite’s BASE_URL while preventing double slashes.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Contains date conversion, formatting, and age‑calculation helpers using nanoseconds and UTC semantics.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main dashboard UI for listing, filtering, sorting, and managing residents.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen with branding and an Internet Identity login button driven by useInternetIdentity.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfile.tsx: Displays a resident’s full profile with data fetching, editing dialogs, medication and vitals management, and error handling tied to the residentId route param.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning values from URLs or hashes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, shadows, radii, and animations with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Captures the project’s current architecture, features, known issues, and versioned component notes for the IC-based assisted living system.
